original_title: Randy Weston: Live in St. Lucia
overview: Filmed live on the beautiful island of St. Lucia, this concert features renowned pianist and composer Randy Weston performing with an impressive group of backup musicians. Blending African rhythms with traditional jazz to create an eclectic sound of his own, Weston delivers a compelling set list that includes "African Cookbook," "The Shrine," "African Sunrise" and "Blue Moses." A bonus interview sheds light on the man and his music.
title: Randy Weston: Live in St. Lucia
